Classes in com.terei.jvector.gui used by com.terei.jvector
ColorPanel
          Creates a panel that allows the user to set a foreground and background colour using swatches (com.terei.jvector.GUI.ColourSwatch) and some tools to manipulate these swatches.
PaintTabbedPane
          This class acts as a standard JTabbedPane, except that it does not allow the user to change the tab when a draw operation is currently in progress.
StatusBarManager
          A reusable class that provides functions to easily implement a status bar on an appliaction that displays tool tips.
 

Classes in com.terei.jvector.gui used by com.terei.jvector.gui
JColor
          A component that just displays a color in a square.

PaintTab
          To change the template for this generated type comment go to Window - Preferences - Java - Code Generation - Code and Comments
